# h

```{r onehcount, include=FALSE}
codeoneh.df <- data.frame(onehm,onehp)
codeoneh.df <- codeoneh.df %>% mutate(onehcode = case_when(onehp+onehm <= 1 ~ '0',
          onehp == 2 & onehm == 2 ~ '±',
			    onehp == 1 & onehm == 1 ~ '0',
          onehp == 2 & onehm == 3 ~ '±',
			    onehp == 3 & onehm == 2 ~ '±',
			    onehp == 2 & onehm == 0 ~ '+',
			    onehp == 2 & onehm == 1 ~ '+',
			    onehp == 3 & onehm == 0 ~ '+',
			    onehp == 3 & onehm == 1 ~ '+',
			    onehp == 0 & onehm == 2 ~ '-',
			    onehp == 1 & onehm == 2 ~ '-',
			    onehp == 0 & onehm == 3 ~ '-',
			    onehp == 1 & onehm == 3 ~ '-',
			    onehp == 4 & onehm == 0 ~ '+!',
			    onehp == 4 & onehm == 1 ~ '+!',
			    onehp == 0 & onehm == 4 ~ '-!',
			    onehp == 1 & onehm == 4 ~ '-!',
		      onehp == 5 & onehm == 0 ~ '+!!',
			    onehp == 5 & onehm == 1 ~ '+!!',
			    onehp == 0 & onehm == 5 ~ '-!!',
			    onehp == 5 & onehm == 1 ~ '-!!',
			    onehp == 6 & onehm == 0 ~ '+!!!',
			    onehp == 6 & onehm == 1 ~ '+!!!',
			    onehp == 0 & onehm == 6 ~ '-!!!',
			    onehp == 1 & onehm == 6 ~ '-!!!',
			    onehp == 3 & onehm == 3 ~ '±!',
			    onehp == 4 & onehm == 2 ~ '±!',
			    onehp == 2 & onehm == 4 ~ '±!'
                            ))

onehcodetable <- table(codeoneh.df$onehcode)
onehcodeproptable.df <- data.frame(prop.table(onehcodetable))
lengthoneh <- length(onehm)
lengthonehn <- paste("N =",lengthoneh)
onehcodepercent.df <- data.frame (Code  = onehcodeproptable.df$Var1, Fréquence=round(onehcodeproptable.df$Freq, 4)*100)
```

## oneh

```{r fig:onehcodes, echo=FALSE}
ggplot(onehcodepercent.df) +
  aes(x = factor(Code, level=c('+', '+!', '+!!', '+!!!', '-', '-!', '-!!', '-!!!', '0', '±', '±!')), y = Fréquence) +
  geom_col(fill = "#BFBFBF") +
  labs(y = "%", title = "Fréquence des codes Szondi pour oneh") +
  theme_minimal() +
  ylim(0, 100) + 
  geom_text(aes(label = Fréquence), size = 3, hjust = 0.5, vjust = -1, position = "stack") +
  geom_text(x=8, y=95, label=lengthonehn)+
  xlab('Code')
```
